CustomField.description: The record ID that this even is related to. This is not a lookup field, which means that the value does not have to be a Salesforce Record ID, but can be a Case Number, for example, instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The record ID that this even is related to. This is not a lookup field, which means that the value does not have to be a Salesforce Record ID, but can be a Case Number, for example, instead.
CustomField.label: Related Record ID
